title: LeaverBuster
body:
I really wanna Fxxk your penalties systems now. This is Bullshit.
I got some lag spikes in the games, then I restart to back to the games. Did I fking get a afk report?
After first time "LeaverBuster" x5 yesterday, I got a afk 2mins in a game due to the same reason of the lag spikes.
Now I got fking 10 mins "LeaverBuster". Fuck u RIOT.
Ok, it's fine. I wait for the 10mins x 5 games gone, and now.. still fucking have the "LeaverBuster" after 5 games.
Can I say again FUCK YOU?
